items.title: Trump’s Parent-Empowering Executive Order Proves He’s The School Choice President
items.description: On Thursday, the president signed an executive order 'expanding educational freedom and opportunity for families.'

items.title: Trump Is Right About Letting Palestinian Refugees Leave Gaza
items.description: Keeping descendants of 1948 refugees in the Gaza Strip perpetuates a futile war against Israel. They should be allowed to flee Hamas’ rule.

items.title: Dear Management, Are You Racist For Ditching DEI?

items.title: Trump’s Executive Order Still Allows Foreigners To Buy U.S. Citizenship Via Surrogacy
items.description: Unless the order’s interpretation of the 14th Amendment addresses all forms of birth tourism, foreign nationals will continue to exploit U.S. citizens...

items.title: Trump’s Educational Freedom Order Extends School Choice Week For Four More Years
items.description: School choice proponents around the country have much to celebrate, but powerful entrenched interests have organized staunch opposition too.
